column5: Does anybody know of any fishing stores within 45min of Oshawa, ON. I know about BPS, and Gagnon Sports.  Thanks
Tightlines..............905-837-0544  West side of Brock Rd in Pickering.....1000' south of 401  Turn into the 1st driveway south of the big flag pole  One of the best fishin stores anywhere !!

Yes John has a great store and probably the best Salmon fishing selection in the area.  Another one you may wish to investigate is LeBaron's. Located at 8365 Woodbine Ave  Markham (905) 944-0682  Good luck.

Check LaBaron's site first to see if they have what you are after and its good place to pick up line at a good price too...  Other option, clearance section at Wallyworld tends to have some hidden gems...  *edit* not the new store though by Gagnon Sports.
Rock n' Reel is located across from the Oshawa center on King Street, immediately to the east of the 7-11.....its a fishing place with a licensed bar (thats right baby!).  forrest
